tool_description: Generates detailed property boundary maps and calculates parcel dimensions, areas, and spatial relationships.

center_latitude.description: Center latitude for mapping area in decimal degrees

center_longitude.description: Center longitude for mapping area in decimal degrees

radius_miles.description: Radius around center point to include in mapping (miles)

parcel_id_filter.description: Optional list of specific parcel IDs to include

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid radius: Radius must be positive and less than 50 miles for performance reasons.
No parcel data available: No property boundary data found for the specified area.
Parcel IDs not found: Some specified parcel IDs could not be located in the area.
usage: Provide center coordinates and radius to define the mapping area. Optionally include easements or filter to specific parcel IDs. The tool returns boundary data and spatial measurements.

total_parcels.description: Number of parcels mapped in the area

total_mapped_area.description: Total area covered by all parcels in acres

boundary_data_quality.description: Quality rating of boundary data: high, medium, low
